original_title: Walt Disney e l'Italia - Una storia d'amore
overview: No other country in the world has the same kind of affection and admiration toward Walt Disney and his art and characters as Italy. His movies are legendary and his stories belong to the collective imagination of generations of Italians who grew up with his world of dreams and hopes. This documentary explores this love story.
title: Walt Disney e l'Italia - Una storia d'amore
